00056 Session::Session(Comm *comm, PropertiesPtr &props_ptr, SessionCallback *callback) : m_comm(comm), m_verbose(false), m_silent(false), m_state(STATE_JEOPARDY), m_session_callback(callback) {
00057   uint16_t master_port;
00058   const char *master_host;
00059 
00060   m_verbose = props_ptr->get_bool("Hypertable.Verbose", false);
00061   m_silent = props_ptr->get_bool("silent", false);
00062   master_host = props_ptr->get("Hyperspace.Master.Host", "localhost");
00063   master_port = (uint16_t)props_ptr->get_int("Hyperspace.Master.Port", Master::DEFAULT_MASTER_PORT);
00064   m_grace_period = (uint32_t)props_ptr->get_int("Hyperspace.GracePeriod", Master::DEFAULT_GRACEPERIOD);
00065   m_lease_interval = (uint32_t)props_ptr->get_int("Hyperspace.Lease.Interval", Master::DEFAULT_LEASE_INTERVAL);
00066 
00067   m_timeout = (uint32_t)props_ptr->get_int("Hyperspace.Client.Timeout", 0);
00068   if (m_timeout == 0)
00069     m_timeout = m_lease_interval * 2;
00070 
00071   if (!InetAddr::initialize(&m_master_addr, master_host, master_port))
00072     exit(1);
00073 
00074   boost::xtime_get(&m_expire_time, boost::TIME_UTC);
00075   m_expire_time.sec += m_grace_period;
00076 
00077   if (m_verbose) {
00078     cout << "Hyperspace.GracePeriod=" << m_grace_period << endl;
00079   }
00080 
00081   m_keepalive_handler_ptr = new ClientKeepaliveHandler(comm, props_ptr, this);
00082 }
00083 
00084 Session::~Session() {
00085   m_keepalive_handler_ptr->destroy_session();
00086 }

00089 uint64_t Session::open(ClientHandleStatePtr &handle_state, CommBufPtr &cbuf_ptr) {
00090   DispatchHandlerSynchronizer sync_handler;
00091   Hypertable::EventPtr event_ptr;
00092 
00093   handle_state->handle = 0;
00094   handle_state->sequencer = 0;
00095   handle_state->lock_status = 0;
00096 
00097   if ((handle_state->open_flags & OPEN_FLAG_LOCK_SHARED) == OPEN_FLAG_LOCK_SHARED)
00098     handle_state->lock_mode = LOCK_MODE_SHARED;
00099   else if ((handle_state->open_flags & OPEN_FLAG_LOCK_EXCLUSIVE) == OPEN_FLAG_LOCK_EXCLUSIVE)
00100     handle_state->lock_mode = LOCK_MODE_EXCLUSIVE;
00101   else
00102     handle_state->lock_mode = 0;
00103 
00104  try_again:
00105   if (!wait_for_safe())
00106     return Error::HYPERSPACE_EXPIRED_SESSION;
00107 
00108   int error = send_message(cbuf_ptr, &sync_handler);
00109   if (error == Error::OK) {
00110     if (!sync_handler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr)) {
00111       error = (int)Protocol::response_code(event_ptr.get());
00112       HT_THROWF(error,  "Hyperspace 'open' error, name=%s flags=0x%x events=0x%x",
00113                 handle_state->normal_name.c_str(), handle_state->open_flags,
00114                 handle_state->event_mask);
00115     }
00116     else {
00117       const uint8_t *ptr = event_ptr->message + 4;
00118       size_t remaining = event_ptr->message_len - 4;
00119       handle_state->handle = decode_i64(&ptr, &remaining);
00120       decode_byte(&ptr, &remaining);
00121       handle_state->lock_generation = decode_i64(&ptr, &remaining);
00123       m_keepalive_handler_ptr->register_handle(handle_state);
00124       return handle_state->handle;
00125     }
00126   }
00127 
00128   state_transition(Session::STATE_JEOPARDY);
00129   goto try_again;
00130 
00131 }

00138 uint64_t Session::open(const std::string &name, uint32_t flags, HandleCallbackPtr &callback) {
00139   ClientHandleStatePtr handle_state(new ClientHandleState());
00140   std::vector<Attribute> empty_attrs;
00141 
00142   handle_state->open_flags = flags;
00143   handle_state->event_mask = (callback) ? callback->get_event_mask() : 0;
00144   handle_state->callback = callback;
00145   normalize_name(name, handle_state->normal_name);
00146 
00147   CommBufPtr cbuf_ptr(Protocol::create_open_request(handle_state->normal_name, flags, callback, empty_attrs));
00148 
00149   return open(handle_state, cbuf_ptr);
00150 }

00157 uint64_t Session::create(const std::string &name, uint32_t flags, HandleCallbackPtr &callback, std::vector<Attribute> &init_attrs) {
00158   ClientHandleStatePtr handle_state(new ClientHandleState());
00159 
00160   handle_state->open_flags = flags | OPEN_FLAG_CREATE | OPEN_FLAG_EXCL;
00161   handle_state->event_mask = (callback) ? callback->get_event_mask() : 0;
00162   handle_state->callback = callback;
00163   normalize_name(name, handle_state->normal_name);
00164 
00165   CommBufPtr cbuf_ptr(Protocol::create_open_request(handle_state->normal_name, handle_state->open_flags, callback, init_attrs));
00166 
00167   return open(handle_state, cbuf_ptr);
00168 }

00175 void Session::close(uint64_t handle) {
00176   DispatchHandlerSynchronizer sync_handler;
00177   Hypertable::EventPtr event_ptr;
00178   CommBufPtr cbuf_ptr(Protocol::create_close_request(handle));
00179 
00180  try_again:
00181   if (!wait_for_safe())
00182     HT_THROW(Error::HYPERSPACE_EXPIRED_SESSION, "");
00183 
00184   int error = send_message(cbuf_ptr, &sync_handler);
00185   if (error == Error::OK) {
00186     if (!sync_handler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr))
00187       HT_THROW((int)Protocol::response_code(event_ptr.get()),
00188                "Hyperspace 'close' error");
00189   }
00190   else {
00191     state_transition(Session::STATE_JEOPARDY);
00192     goto try_again;
00193   }
00194 }

00255 bool Session::exists(const std::string &name) {
00256   DispatchHandlerSynchronizer sync_handler;
00257   Hypertable::EventPtr event_ptr;
00258   std::string normal_name;
00259 
00260   normalize_name(name, normal_name);
00261 
00262   CommBufPtr cbuf_ptr(Protocol::create_exists_request(normal_name));
00263 
00264  try_again:
00265   if (!wait_for_safe())
00266     HT_THROW(Error::HYPERSPACE_EXPIRED_SESSION, "");
00267 
00268   int error = send_message(cbuf_ptr, &sync_handler);
00269   if (error == Error::OK) {
00270     if (!sync_handler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr)) {
00271       HT_THROWF((int)Protocol::response_code(event_ptr.get()),
00272                 "Hyperspace 'exists' error, name=%s", normal_name.c_str());
00273     }
00274     else {
00275       const uint8_t *ptr = event_ptr->message + 4;
00276       size_t remaining = event_ptr->message_len - 4;
00277       uint8_t bval = decode_byte(&ptr, &remaining);
00278       return (bval == 0) ? false : true;
00279     }
00280   }
00281 
00282   state_transition(Session::STATE_JEOPARDY);
00283   goto try_again;
00284 }

00290 void Session::attr_set(uint64_t handle, const std::string &name, const void *value, size_t value_len) {
00291   DispatchHandlerSynchronizer sync_handler;
00292   Hypertable::EventPtr event_ptr;
00293   CommBufPtr cbuf_ptr(Protocol::create_attr_set_request(handle, name, value, value_len));
00294 
00295  try_again:
00296   if (!wait_for_safe())
00297     HT_THROW(Error::HYPERSPACE_EXPIRED_SESSION, "");
00298 
00299   int error = send_message(cbuf_ptr, &sync_handler);
00300   if (error == Error::OK) {
00301     if (!sync_handler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr)) {
00302       ClientHandleStatePtr handle_state;
00303       String fname = "UNKNOWN";
00304       if (m_keepalive_handler_ptr->get_handle_state(handle, handle_state))
00305         fname = handle_state->normal_name.c_str();
00306       HT_THROWF((int)Protocol::response_code(event_ptr.get()),
00307                 "Problem setting attribute '%s' of hyperspace file '%s'", name.c_str(),
00308                 fname.c_str());
00309     }
00310     return;
00311   }
00312 
00313   state_transition(Session::STATE_JEOPARDY);
00314   goto try_again;
00315 }

00321 void Session::attr_get(uint64_t handle, const std::string &name, DynamicBuffer &value) {
00322   DispatchHandlerSynchronizer sync_handler;
00323   Hypertable::EventPtr event_ptr;
00324   CommBufPtr cbuf_ptr(Protocol::create_attr_get_request(handle, name));
00325 
00326  try_again:
00327   if (!wait_for_safe())
00328     HT_THROW(Error::HYPERSPACE_EXPIRED_SESSION, "");
00329 
00330   int error = send_message(cbuf_ptr, &sync_handler);
00331   if (error == Error::OK) {
00332     if (!sync_handler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr)) {
00333       ClientHandleStatePtr handle_state;
00334       String fname = "UNKNOWN";
00335       if (m_keepalive_handler_ptr->get_handle_state(handle, handle_state))
00336         fname = handle_state->normal_name.c_str();
00337       HT_THROWF((int)Protocol::response_code(event_ptr.get()),
00338                 "Problem getting attribute '%s' of hyperspace file '%s'", name.c_str(),
00339                 fname.c_str());
00340     }
00341     else {
00342       uint32_t attr_val_len = 0;
00343       const uint8_t *ptr = event_ptr->message + 4;
00344       size_t remaining = event_ptr->message_len - 4;
00345       void *attr_val = decode_bytes32(&ptr, &remaining, &attr_val_len);
00346       value.clear();
00347       value.ensure(attr_val_len+1);
00348       value.add_unchecked(attr_val, attr_val_len);
00349       // nul-terminate to make caller's lives easier
00350       *value.ptr = 0;
00351     }
00352   }
00353   else {
00354     state_transition(Session::STATE_JEOPARDY);
00355     goto try_again;
00356   }
00357 }

00392 void Session::readdir(uint64_t handle, std::vector<DirEntry> &listing) {
00393   DispatchHandlerSynchronizer sync_handler;
00394   Hypertable::EventPtr event_ptr;
00395   CommBufPtr cbuf_ptr(Protocol::create_readdir_request(handle));
00396 
00397  try_again:
00398   if (!wait_for_safe())
00399     HT_THROW(Error::HYPERSPACE_EXPIRED_SESSION, "");
00400 
00401   int error = send_message(cbuf_ptr, &sync_handler);
00402   if (error == Error::OK) {
00403     if (!sync_handler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr)) {
00404       HT_THROW((int)Protocol::response_code(event_ptr.get()),
00405                "Hyperspace 'readdir' error");
00406     }
00407     else {
00408       const uint8_t *ptr = event_ptr->message + 4;
00409       size_t remaining = event_ptr->message_len - 4;
00410       uint32_t entry_cnt;
00411       DirEntry dentry;
00412       try {
00413         entry_cnt = decode_i32(&ptr, &remaining);
00414       }
00415       catch (Exception &e) {
00416         HT_THROW2(Error::PROTOCOL_ERROR, e, "");
00417       }
00418       listing.clear();
00419       for (uint32_t i=0; i<entry_cnt; i++) {
00420         try {
00421           decode_dir_entry(&ptr, &remaining, dentry);
00422         }
00423         catch (Exception &e) {
00424           HT_THROW2F(Error::PROTOCOL_ERROR, e, 
00425                      "Problem decoding entry %d of READDIR return packet", i);
00426         }
00427         listing.push_back(dentry);
00428       }
00429     }
00430   }
00431   else {
00432     state_transition(Session::STATE_JEOPARDY);
00433     goto try_again;
00434   }
00435 }

00438 
00439 void Session::lock(uint64_t handle, uint32_t mode, LockSequencer *sequencerp) {
00440   DispatchHandlerSynchronizer sync_handler;
00441   Hypertable::EventPtr event_ptr;
00442   CommBufPtr cbuf_ptr(Protocol::create_lock_request(handle, mode, false));
00443   ClientHandleStatePtr handle_state;
00444   uint32_t status = 0;
00445 
00446   if (!m_keepalive_handler_ptr->get_handle_state(handle, handle_state))
00447     HT_THROW(Error::HYPERSPACE_INVALID_HANDLE, "");
00448 
00449   if (handle_state->lock_status != 0)
00450     HT_THROW(Error::HYPERSPACE_ALREADY_LOCKED, "");
00451 
00452  try_again:
00453   if (!wait_for_safe())
00454     HT_THROW(Error::HYPERSPACE_EXPIRED_SESSION, "");
00455 
00456   {
00457     boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(handle_state->mutex);
00458     sequencerp->mode = mode;
00459     sequencerp->name = handle_state->normal_name;
00460     handle_state->sequencer = sequencerp;
00461   }
00462 
00463   int error = send_message(cbuf_ptr, &sync_handler);
00464   if (error == Error::OK) {
00465     if (!sync_handler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr))
00466       HT_THROWF((int)Protocol::response_code(event_ptr.get()),
00467                 "Hyperspace 'lock' error, name='%s'", handle_state->normal_name.c_str());
00468     else {
00469       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(handle_state->mutex);
00470       const uint8_t *ptr = event_ptr->message + 4;
00471       size_t remaining = event_ptr->message_len - 4;
00472       handle_state->lock_mode = mode;
00473       try {
00474         status = decode_i32(&ptr, &remaining);
00475 
00476         if (status == LOCK_STATUS_GRANTED) {
00477           sequencerp->generation = decode_i64(&ptr, &remaining);
00478           handle_state->lock_generation = sequencerp->generation;
00479           handle_state->lock_status = LOCK_STATUS_GRANTED;
00480         }
00481         else {
00482           assert(status == LOCK_STATUS_PENDING);
00483           handle_state->lock_status = LOCK_STATUS_PENDING;
00484           while (handle_state->lock_status == LOCK_STATUS_PENDING)
00485             handle_state->cond.wait(lock);
00486           if (handle_state->lock_status == LOCK_STATUS_CANCELLED)
00487             HT_THROW(Error::HYPERSPACE_REQUEST_CANCELLED, "");
00488           assert(handle_state->lock_status == LOCK_STATUS_GRANTED);
00489         }
00490       }
00491       catch (Exception &e) {
00492         HT_THROW2(e.code(), e, "lock response decode error");
00493       }
00494     }
00495   }
00496   else {
00497     state_transition(Session::STATE_JEOPARDY);
00498     goto try_again;
00499   }
00500 
00501 }
00502 
00503 
00504 
00505 void Session::try_lock(uint64_t handle, uint32_t mode, uint32_t *statusp, LockSequencer *sequencerp) {
00506   DispatchHandlerSynchronizer sync_handler;
00507   Hypertable::EventPtr event_ptr;
00508   CommBufPtr cbuf_ptr(Protocol::create_lock_request(handle, mode, true));
00509   ClientHandleStatePtr handle_state;
00510 
00511   if (!m_keepalive_handler_ptr->get_handle_state(handle, handle_state))
00512     HT_THROW(Error::HYPERSPACE_INVALID_HANDLE, "");
00513 
00514   if (handle_state->lock_status != 0)
00515     HT_THROW(Error::HYPERSPACE_ALREADY_LOCKED, "");
00516 
00517  try_again:
00518   if (!wait_for_safe())
00519     HT_THROW(Error::HYPERSPACE_EXPIRED_SESSION, "");
00520 
00521   int error = send_message(cbuf_ptr, &sync_handler);
00522   if (error == Error::OK) {
00523     if (!sync_handler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr))
00524       HT_THROWF((int)Protocol::response_code(event_ptr.get()),
00525                 "Hyperspace 'try_lock' error, name='%s'", handle_state->normal_name.c_str());
00526     else {
00527       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(handle_state->mutex);
00528       const uint8_t *ptr = event_ptr->message + 4;
00529       size_t remaining = event_ptr->message_len - 4;
00530       try {
00531         *statusp = decode_i32(&ptr, &remaining);
00532 
00533         if (*statusp == LOCK_STATUS_GRANTED) {
00534           sequencerp->generation = decode_i64(&ptr, &remaining);
00535           sequencerp->mode = mode;
00536           sequencerp->name = handle_state->normal_name;
00537           handle_state->lock_mode = mode;
00538           handle_state->lock_status = LOCK_STATUS_GRANTED;
00539           handle_state->lock_generation = sequencerp->generation;
00540           handle_state->sequencer = 0;
00541         }
00542       }
00543       catch (Exception &e) {
00544         HT_THROW2(e.code(), e, "try_lock response decode error");
00545       }
00546     }
00547   }
00548   else {
00549     state_transition(Session::STATE_JEOPARDY);
00550     goto try_again;
00551   }
00552 
00553 }
00554 
00555 
00556 void Session::release(uint64_t handle) {
00557   DispatchHandlerSynchronizer sync_handler;
00558   Hypertable::EventPtr event_ptr;
00559   CommBufPtr cbuf_ptr(Protocol::create_release_request(handle));
00560   ClientHandleStatePtr handle_state;
00561 
00562   if (!m_keepalive_handler_ptr->get_handle_state(handle, handle_state))
00563     HT_THROW(Error::HYPERSPACE_INVALID_HANDLE, "");
00564 
00565  try_again:
00566   if (!wait_for_safe())
00567     HT_THROW(Error::HYPERSPACE_EXPIRED_SESSION, "");
00568 
00569   int error = send_message(cbuf_ptr, &sync_handler);
00570   if (error == Error::OK) {
00571     boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(handle_state->mutex);
00572     if (!sync_handler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr))
00573       HT_THROW((int)Protocol::response_code(event_ptr.get()),
00574                "Hyperspace 'release' error");
00575     handle_state->lock_status = 0;
00576     handle_state->cond.notify_all();
00577   }
00578   else {
00579     state_transition(Session::STATE_JEOPARDY);
00580     goto try_again;
00581   }
00582 
00583 }

00585 
00586 
00587 void Session::get_sequencer(uint64_t handle, LockSequencer *sequencerp) {
00588   ClientHandleStatePtr handle_state;
00589 
00590   if (!m_keepalive_handler_ptr->get_handle_state(handle, handle_state))
00591     HT_THROW(Error::HYPERSPACE_INVALID_HANDLE, "");
00592 
00593   if (handle_state->lock_generation == 0)
00594     HT_THROW(Error::HYPERSPACE_NOT_LOCKED, "");
00595 
00596   sequencerp->name = handle_state->normal_name;
00597   sequencerp->mode = handle_state->lock_mode;
00598   sequencerp->generation = handle_state->lock_generation;
00599 
00600 }

00610 
00613 int Session::status() {
00614   DispatchHandlerSynchronizer sync_handler;
00615   EventPtr event_ptr;
00616   CommBufPtr cbuf_ptr(Protocol::create_status_request());
00617   int error = send_message(cbuf_ptr, &sync_handler);
00618   if (error == Error::OK) {
00619     if (!sync_handler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr))
00620       error = (int)Protocol::response_code(event_ptr);
00621   }
00622   return error;
00623 }

00627 
00628 
00631 int Session::state_transition(int state) {
00632   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00633   int old_state = m_state;
00634   m_state = state;
00635   if (m_state == STATE_SAFE) {
00636     m_cond.notify_all();
00637     if (m_session_callback && old_state == STATE_JEOPARDY)
00638       m_session_callback->safe();
00639   }
00640   else if (m_state == STATE_JEOPARDY) {
00641     if (m_session_callback && old_state == STATE_SAFE) {
00642       m_session_callback->jeopardy();
00643       boost::xtime_get(&m_expire_time, boost::TIME_UTC);
00644       m_expire_time.sec += m_grace_period;
00645     }
00646   }
00647   else if (m_state == STATE_EXPIRED) {
00648     if (m_session_callback && old_state != STATE_EXPIRED)
00649       m_session_callback->expired();
00650     m_cond.notify_all();
00651   }
00652   return old_state;
00653 }
00654 
00655 
00656 
00659 int Session::get_state() {
00660   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00661   return m_state;
00662 }
00663 
00664 
00667 bool Session::expired() {
00668   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00669   boost::xtime now;
00670   boost::xtime_get(&now, boost::TIME_UTC);
00671   if (xtime_cmp(m_expire_time, now) < 0)
00672     return true;
00673   return false;
00674 }
00675 
00676 
00679 bool Session::wait_for_connection(long max_wait_secs) {
00680   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00681   boost::xtime drop_time, now;
00682 
00683   boost::xtime_get(&drop_time, boost::TIME_UTC);
00684   drop_time.sec += max_wait_secs;
00685 
00686   while (m_state != STATE_SAFE) {
00687     m_cond.timed_wait(lock, drop_time);
00688     boost::xtime_get(&now, boost::TIME_UTC);
00689     if (xtime_cmp(now, drop_time) >= 0)
00690       return false;
00691   }
00692   return true;
00693 }
00694 
00695 
00696 
00697 bool Session::wait_for_safe() {
00698   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00699   while (m_state != STATE_SAFE) {
00700     if (m_state == STATE_EXPIRED)
00701       return false;
00702     m_cond.wait(lock);
00703   }
00704   return true;
00705 }
00706 
00707 int Session::send_message(CommBufPtr &cbuf_ptr, DispatchHandler *handler) {
00708   int error;
00709 
00710   if ((error = m_comm->send_request(m_master_addr, m_timeout, cbuf_ptr, handler)) != Error::OK) {
00711     std::string str;
00712     if (!m_silent)
00713       HT_WARNF("Comm::send_request to Hypertable.Master at %s failed - %s",
00714                   InetAddr::string_format(str, m_master_addr), Error::get_text(error));
00715   }
00716   return error;
00717 }
00718 
00719 
00723 void Session::normalize_name(const std::string &name, std::string &normal) {
00724 
00725   if (name == "/") {
00726     normal = name;
00727     return;
00728   }
00729 
00730   normal = "";
00731   if (name[0] != '/')
00732     normal += "/";
00733 
00734   if (name.find('/', name.length()-1) == string::npos)
00735     normal += name;
00736   else
00737     normal += name.substr(0, name.length()-1);
00738 }
